transcript:
Customer: Video call?
Executive: Haanji haanji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haanji sir, Mitratak company se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Sir, main Shivam baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se feedback team se.
Customer: Haanji haanji.
Executive: Haan. Sir aap registered hai IndiaMART par kaafi time se but sir aap use nahi kar rahe service ko.
Customer: Sir koi issue aa raha hai?
Executive: Uh, issue nahi main thoda busy tha isiliye nahi use kar raha usko.
Customer: Achcha to sir abhi ke liye use karenge sir isko?
Customer: Uh, kaise?
Executive: Sir abhi se sir isko use karenge aap ab se? Agar aap ab tak itna hi abhi.
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi jarurat nahi hai. Main aapka number save kar leta hun.
Customer: To jab jarurat hogi to main aapko back call karunga.
Executive: Achcha achcha sir abhi ke liye hum customers kar lete hain isko thoda sa kyuki aapka catalog kaafi matlab maintain nahi hai to kuch cheezein usme theek kar lete hain abhi do minute ke liye.
Customer: Nahi main na abhi drive kar raha hun.
Executive: To main sir main aapko sir kaafi baar try karne ki koshish ki but sir aap har baar busy hote hain do minute de dijiye sir ek baar aapke catalog ke liye hi call kiya tha main.
Customer: Hmm. Nahi aap ek baar aise hi rehne do.
Executive: Haanji.
Customer: Jaisa hai ek baar aise hi rehne do jaisa hai. Main abhi aapko free hoke tab back call karta hun.
Executive: To theek hai sir but sir issue kya aa raha hai sir isme aapko?
Customer: Nahi kuch nahi issue mere paas time nahi hai abhi na wo chalane ke liye.
Executive: Achcha to but sir jo first matlab mam baat karti hai wo to unko kuch pata hi nahi hai wo bolti ki service ke bare mein unko kuch pata nahi hai I think but unka number primary number mein aa gaya sir fir bhi.
Customer: Suno main aapko back call karta hun abhi.
Executive: Haan mere ko do minute do.
Customer: Main unse baat kar lunga fir main.
Executive: Haan aap kar lo.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not using IndiaMART service.

- Customer says executive's colleague lacks service knowledge.



Resolution:

- Executive offered catalog maintenance.

- Customer declined due to being busy.

- Customer will call back when free.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, service, busy, back call
